about.title: About Me
about.content: Computer Engineering with an interest in designing and building full-stack applications. I enjoy learning new technologies, solving problems with practical solutions, and working on projects that integrate different areas such as backend, databases, cloud deployment, and frontend.

mobile.title: Backend Development
mobile.desc: I enjoy working with Java and Spring Boot to create APIs and services that solve problems practically.

web.title: Database Management
web.desc: I have experience with SQL (PostgreSQL) in school and personal projects.

uiux.title: CI/CD & Cloud
uiux.desc: I have practiced with GitHub Actions, Docker, and have deployed projects in the cloud using services like Heroku, Cloudflare, AWS, and DigitalOcean.

backend.title: Frontend Development
backend.desc: I use React to create simple and functional interfaces, focusing on practice, school, and portfolio projects.

translator.title: AI Code Translator
translator.desc: Web app that translates code between different programming languages. Implemented with Spring Boot (on Heroku Dynos) and React (on Cloudflare Pages). Backend integrated with the OpenAI API, CI/CD in GitHub Actions for automatic deployment.

ovenproject.title: Smart Oven Project
ovenproject.desc: Project that controls a simulated oven circuit through a mobile app written in React Native and a Java API REST with Spring Boot.
